text: Jeanne Atherden is a Bermudian politician and Leader of the Opposition in the House of Assembly of Bermuda. She became opposition leader after winning the party leadership of the largest opposition party, the One Bermuda Alliance, in November 2017. In 2008 she was appointed to serve as a Senator and since 2013 has served as an MP for Pembroke West.Members of parliament Bermuda Parliament.
